response: Salaam Miya! Hum Lallan, Lucknow ka jaankari wala network haan. Janab-e-Alaa, aapne context me jo naam diye hain, unme se koi bhi Ratti Lal ke khasta ke bare me nahi bata raha. To hum aapko is bare me kuch nahi bata sakte.

Salaam Miya! 

Janab-e-Alaa, Humko to aapka swagaat kar ke bohot khushi ho rahi hai. 

Janab-e-Alaa, aapne jo context diya hai usme to humko kuch bhi nahi dikh raha ki aap kya poochna chahte hain. Aap zara sawaal thoda clear kar ke pooch sakte hain kya?
